data.title: Webcasting - Live and On-Demand Streaming Media for Business
meta_keywords: webcasting live event streaming media broadcast technology expertise encoding video audio virtual events professionals Philadelphia worldwide
data.meta_description: Learn how your training, product launch, or any staged event can be broadcast on the internet live or on-demand with FMP webcasting.
data.text:
What good is your message if your site can’t host it? Without the proper internet distribution methodology, your webcast event will fall flat. And now that video on mobile devices is expected, design and technology expertise is more critical than ever.

Fortunately, FMP has all of this covered, providing the right webcasting tools tailored for your audience, network and delivery needs. We’ll put our proven experience to work managing IT concerns, from simple player implementation to complete site design, and have your content looking great on any device.

No project is too big or too small. From supplying a single streaming URL to complex live productions with several simultaneous streams for a virtual environment, FMP will ensure satisfaction and reliability throughout the production cycle. For more detail, check out our portfolio page.

HD Polycom can be used to transmit two-way video as part of a live event – for instance, to bring in a presenter or demonstration from a remote location. HD Polycom transmission can also be used as the source for a video webcast.

FMP has years of experience with HD Polycom – and we’re one of only a handful of production companies in the world who can make that claim. Our team will provide the equipment and expertise, and partner with your IT department to ensure a robust connection with minimal impact on your network. Call for more information 610.825.4000.
